data.text: @hagegeingob Indeed....besides the oil is not ours....
@hagegeingob Candle sizes may vary but they provide the same light, not where you are and what your status is but it is your Quality & Personality that makes you a Light to the Nation.
@hagegeingob That is how we consolidate the Namibian house!!! Such pace must be commended!
@hagegeingob “Do not hate your brother in your heart … Do not seek revenge or bear a grudge … but love your neighbor as yourself.” Lev. 19:9-18
@hagegeingob It is true. Engagement is part of our good relationship in politics as well.

@hagegeingob WORKING TOGETHER! NAM's political climate speaks volume. With different 🕊 political parties having easy access to the Head of State, NAM is "showing" the way across the globe, especially Africa. Yes, these kind of "interaction" builds a ⚓ nation & is good for democracy. BRAVO🇳🇦 https://t.co/r7oPIdRs0t

@ReconReporter @hagegeingob The people of Kavango were paid 50k donation to change their minds on this issue, That's no longer an issue. 
By the way, that oil legally DOESN'T belong to Namibia
@hagegeingob Onwards and upwards Cde President.! @hagegeingob God speed.!

@hagegeingob All those opposition leaders came to you to discuss greenHydrogen only? So, those leaders don't care about Namibians just like you Mr president. How on earth you approved N$ 25 million to be spent on independence celebration and those you are seating with never asked u about it?
